abstract: Arizona Gov Doug Ducey says state has canceled contract with prison operator Management and Training Corporation due to training and security lapses that set stage for July prison riots.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Doug Ducey said on Wednesday that the state had canceled its contract with a private prison operator over a series of security and training lapses that set the stage for riots at a prison in July.

headline.main: Arizona: State Ends Deal With Prison Contractor
headline.print_headline: Arizona: State Ends Deal With Prison Contractor

snippet: Gov. Doug Ducey said on Wednesday that the state had canceled its contract with a private prison operator over a series of security and training lapses that set the stage for riots at a prison in July.
